text: He was transporting food and other essential items to displaced persons in Baddegama.President Maithripala Sirisena telephoned and congratulated the pilot of the ill fated helicopter Bhanuka Delgahagoda for his brave act of safely lowering the helicopter to the water as it went out of control. He was transporting food and other essential items to displaced persons in Baddegama.
title: President hails pilots bravery
